messages.subject: what we used to put our kids through
messages.msgSnippet: ... My oldest two went to school, my youngest does not.  My daughter knows how I feel now, and somehow she never got around to sending her son to school,
messages.messageBody:
> The things I used to put my kids through,
> especially my oldest!

My oldest two went to school, my youngest does not. My daughter knows how
I feel now, and somehow she never got around to sending her son to school,
either. (He would've been in K this year.)
She asked me recently, "So why did I have to go to school?" I answered
quite honestly, "Because I didn't know any better."
"Really? That's it?"
"That's it."

Mary J


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
